articles.title: Gaetz is not the only Trump nominee who faces ‘danger’ in confirmation: Tiana Lowe Doescher
articles.description: Rep. Matt Gaetz's (R-FL) nomination for AG has stirred much controversy and doubt, in addition to that of RFK Jr., who was tapped for HHS secretary.
articles.content:
The Washington Examiner’s Tiana Lowe Doescher suggested there is more than one nominee for Trump’s Cabinet who faces “danger” in his confirmation, despite the brunt of attention being given to former Rep. Matt Gaetz (R-FL).

articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Trump's Health Policy Picks Stir Controversy: OMB, FDA, and More
articles.description: Donald Trump is planning to appoint Russell Vought as director of the Office of Management and Budget. Additionally, Trump is likely to choose Martin Makary for the FDA. Meanwhile, Bill Hwang was sentenced for financial fraud, and calls for higher pilot retirement age surface. Other legal proceedings and charges continue amidst Trump's transition.
articles.content: President-elect Donald Trump is poised to designate Russell Vought, a staunch conservative ally, to lead the U.S. Office of Management and Budget (OMB). This role would provide Vought the ability to shape significant budgeting and policy decisions, a... [664 chars]

articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Makary Set to Lead America's Most Powerful Drug Regulator
articles.description: U.S. President-elect Donald Trump is expected to nominate Johns Hopkins surgeon Martin Makary to head the FDA. Makary, known for his views on natural immunity and opposition to COVID vaccine mandates, could bring unconventional changes to the influential agency responsible for overseeing drugs, food safety, and medical devices.
articles.content: Amidst a whirlwind of political appointments, President-elect Donald Trump is reportedly set to name Martin Makary, a renowned surgeon and writer from Johns Hopkins, as the new head of the Food and Drug Administration (FDA). According to sources clos... [914 chars]

articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Mexico's First Female President Aims for Diplomatic Balance with Trump
articles.description: Mexico's new president, Claudia Sheinbaum, plans to collaborate constructively with President-elect Donald Trump on reducing migration while advocating for humanitarian policies. She aims to propose a strategy addressing root causes of migration, maintaining strong U.S.-Mexico relations, and countering potential trade tensions.
articles.content: Mexico's new president, Claudia Sheinbaum, outlined her approach to managing the country's relationship with the incoming U.S. President, Donald Trump, focusing on collaboration and humanitarian policies. She aims to address migration's root causes, ... [680 chars]

articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Ethical Dilemma: Gaetz's Controversial Nomination
articles.description: A congressional ethics panel is deadlocked on whether to release a report on alleged sexual misconduct by Matt Gaetz. The controversy centers on his nomination by President-elect Trump for attorney general. The Ethics Committee remains divided, and Gaetz's confirmation hangs in the balance.
